channel.title: Enable Trading in TeamTorva
channel.description: Hey guys, I have been running a server based off of team torva source, and I was just wondering how i can enable trading? The problem is that players can bring up the trade menu, and offer items and take items away, but they cannot hit accept. any solutions?

item.title: Enable Trading in TeamTorva
item.dc:creator: @zach55200 zach55200
item.description:
@zach55200 wrote:

Somewhere in your source its not alowing you to trade so for example it might say

tradestatus;false <---- something like that change it to true and does it have dialog?
like “trading has been disabled.”
if so look in your client. hope i helped

Read full topic
